meta.title: Shahar Dahan | Results Driven Coaching
meta.description: Coaching athletes at every level toward success while enjoying the journey

home.name: Shahar Dahan
home.title: Triathlon & Fitness Coach
home.visionDescription: Coaching athletes at every level toward success while enjoying the journey

about.description: After 23 years in tech, I followed my passion and became a certified Triathlon Instructor and Personal Fitness Coach. I specialize in performance and rehab coaching—helping athletes prepare for triathlons, Ironman, MTB races, and marathons, as well as guiding people through recovery and strength-building after injury. My goal: to help you train smarter, recover stronger, and live better.

testimonials.name: Itamar Golan
testimonials.title: Triathlete
testimonials.description:
Shahar is an amazing coach!
He guided me from zero experience to completing a Half Ironman, and now continues to train me with a full strength program alongside mountain bike workouts.
A true professional with a personal approach, always available for any question — simply a great guy!
Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Helen Moreh
testimonials.title: Mountain Bike Rider
testimonials.description:
My name is Helen, a competitive mountain biker for 5 years, age 53.

In a very short time, Shahar strengthened my natural athletic abilities and taught me there’s another, better way to build a solid foundation.
Thanks to him, I have more confidence in my abilities.
He has a real talent for discovering his athletes’ inner strength — all done calmly and peacefully.

testimonials.name: Alon Menashe
testimonials.title: Training for Epic Israel
testimonials.description:
Shahar guided me in preparation for the Epic Israel race with personal technical off-road training sessions that significantly improved my confidence and control on the bike. Between one Epic race and the next, Shahar also coached me for a Half Ironman – in a smart, precise, and effective way that balanced the training load with a demanding job, while demonstrating deep understanding of both the physiological and nutritional aspects.
Shahar is a professional, thorough, attentive, and caring coach – and his added value is felt at every stage of the journey.

testimonials.name: Shlomi Erezoni
testimonials.title: Training for Epic Israel
testimonials.description:
Shahar coached me for two years in preparation for the Epic Israel races, accompanying me with personal technical off-road training sessions that greatly improved my confidence and control on the bike.

Shahar is a thorough, intelligent, and caring coach who knows how to bring out the best in you – and his added value is felt every step of the way.

testimonials.name: Yanai Dado
testimonials.title: Cyclist
testimonials.description: The training program is fully personalized according to my schedule and syncs seamlessly with my watch. The workouts helped me a lot — especially in cycling and swimming, where I had no previous experience and saw the biggest improvements.

testimonials.name: Itamar Roginsky
testimonials.title: Half Ironman Trainee
testimonials.description:
I am Itamar, a 19-year-old half-ironman trainee.
I got into the triathlon without any experience and thanks to Shahar I see a significant improvement and train systematically without burdening me and leading to suggestions.
I highly recommend Shahar, a wonderful trainer with a personal and warm relationship to athletes.

offers.title: Post injury rehabilitation program
offers.description:
• Improve range of motion, flexibility, and strength
  • Gradually build confidence, return to general fitness
  • Customized weekly plan, using Training Peaks software
  • Personal guidance throughout the process, with on-demand communication for questions and adjustments

offers.title: Cycling or Running training
offers.description:
• Training focused on strength (aerobic, anaerobic, and explosive power)
  • Cycling/Running technique workouts
  • Customized weekly plan, using Training Peaks software
  • Personal guidance throughout the process, with on-demand communication for questions and adjustments

offers.title: Triathlon Coaching
offers.description:
• Coaching on Tri disciplines (swimming, cycling, and running)
  • Open water swimming practice and transition training
  • Customized weekly plan, using Training Peaks software
  • Personal guidance throughout the process, with on-demand communication for questions and adjustments

questions.question: How does it work?
questions.answer:
• A personal and professional plan tailored to the athlete’s goals
  • Workout analysis and constant feedback using advanced technology
  • Briefings/debriefings before and after races and important workouts
  • On-demand communication and plan adjustments

questions.question: Who is it for?
questions.answer:
• Triathletes
    • Beginner with basic knowledge
    • Professional seeking to improve their performance
  • Cyclists and Runners of all levels
  • Athletes & individuals who want to recover from injury effectively

questions.question: Ready to start?
questions.answer:
• If you are preparing for a triathlon or cycling competition
  • Enjoy independent training
  • Looking for a coach who will provide personal attention, close guidance, and a professional training plan
  • Want to balance family life with your passion for sports
    • You’ve come to the right place!

contact.whatsappText: I would like to receive additional information

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.content: Shahar Dahan - Results Driven Coaching is committed to providing an accessible website experience for all users. We strive to ensure that our website is usable by people with disabilities and that it meets the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 AA standards.
